quote: Some people die at 25 and aren’t buried until 75.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: If your only goal is to become rich, you will never achieve it.
author: John D. Rockefeller Sr.

quote: When people talk, listen completely. Most people never listen.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Better to jump and make a mistake than sit there too frightened to make a move.
author: Richard Templar

quote: If you are comfortable dancing in public without alcohol or drugs, you are at peace with who you are.
author: Ankur Warikoo

quote: People do not decide their futures, they decide their habits and their habits decide their futures.
author: F.M. Alexander

quote: Never put too much trust in friends, learn how to use enemies.
author: Robert Greene

quote: Only staying active will make you want to live a hundred years.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: You are what you eat and read.
author: Maya Corrigan

quote: Fall in love with taking care of yourself. Fall in love with becoming the best version of yourself but with patience, with compassion and respect to your own journey.
author: S. Mcnutt

quote: The first step toward getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are.
author: J.P. Morgan

quote: The single most powerful asset we all have is our mind. If it is trained well, it can create enormous wealth.
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quote: Learn to choose your mental health over old attachments.
author: Hana Shebar

quote: If it isn’t a clear yes, then it’s a clear no.
author: Greg McKeown

quote: Procrastination will delay your dreams.
author: Vex King

quote: Reading an hour a day is only 4% of your day. But that 4% will put you at the top of your field within 10 years. Find the time.
author: Patrick Bet-David

quote: May God have mercy upon my enemies, because I won’t.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Surround yourself only with people who are going to lift you higher.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: If you cannot decide, the answer is no.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: You’ll never find a rainbow if you’re looking down.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: Always say less than necessary.
author: Robert Greene

quote: It always seems impossible, until it is done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Remember, some of the best times of your life haven’t even happened yet.
author: Doug Carwright

quote: A ship is safe in harbor, but that’s not what ships are built for.
author: John A. Shedd

quote: When a person can’t find a deep sense of meaning, they distract themselves with pleasure.
author: Victor Frankl

quote: A man who fears suffering is already suffering from what he fears.
author: Montaigne

quote: We work jobs we hate, to buy things we don’t need, to impress people we don’t like.
author: Tyler Durden

quote: Your time is limited so don’t waste it living someone else’s life.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
author: Aristotle

quote: By changing nothing, nothing changes.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: If you’re serious about changing your life, you’ll find a way. If not you’ll find an excuse.
author: Jen Sincero

quote: Your life does not get better by chance, it gets better by change.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Change is hard at first, messy in the middle and gorgeous at the end.
author: Robin Sharma

quote: You will face many defeats in life but never let yourself be defeated.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: If you want a new idea, read an old book.
author: Ivan Pavlov

quote: If you can change your mind, you can change your life.
author: William James

quote: If people are not laughing at your goals, your goals are too small.
author: Azim Premji

quote: If you are lonely when you’re alone you are in a bad company.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: We suffer more in imagination than in reality.
author: Seneca

quote: When you have something to say, silence is a lie.
author: Jordan B. Peterson

quote: The oldest, shortest words - ‘yes’ and ‘no’ - are those which require the most thought.
author: Pythagoras

quote: In life, the only two things you can control are your effort and your attitude. Everything else is not up to you.
author: S. Mcnutt

quote: Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: If you live each day as if it were your last, someday you’ll be right.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Don’t judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: The best revenge is not to be like your enemy.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Everyone must choose one of two pains: The pain of discipline or the pain of regret.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Never spend money before you have it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: The poor and the middle class work for money. The rich have money work for them.
author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quote: He who has a why to live for can bear with almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I’d rather be optimistic and wrong than pessimistic and right.
author: Elon Musk

quote: Everyone thinks of changing the world but no one thinks of changing himself.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: One day you will wake up and there won’t be any more time to do things you’ve always wanted. Do it now.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: You should examine yourself daily. If you find faults, you should correct them. When you find none, you should try even harder.
author: Israel Zangwill

quote: If you set your goals ridiculously high and it’s a failure, you will fail above everyone else’s success.
author: James Cameron

quote: Travel and tell no one, live a true love story and tell no one, live happily and tell no one, people ruin beautiful things.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: The nearer a man comes to a calm mind, the closer he is to strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself and you are the easiest person to fool.
author: Richard Feynman

quote: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Step out of your comfort zone and face your fears. Growth takes place when you are challenged, not when you are comfortable.
author: Vex King

quote: Be so good that they can’t ignore you.
author: Steve Martin

quote: Who chases two rabbits catches neither.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: When you focus on you, you grow. When you focus on shit, shit grows.
author: Unknown

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: A little impatience will spoil great plans.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: You’ve made mistakes in the past, you will probably make more in future. And that’s ok.
author: Hanna Shebar

quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
author: Elon Musk

quote: A good plan, violently executed now, is better than a perfect plan next week.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.
author: Aristotle

quote: If you want to conquer fear, don’t sit home and think about it. Go out and get busy.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: A fit body, a calm mind, a house full of love. These things cannot be bought - they must be earned.
author: Naval Ravikant

quote: No mortal man is wise at all moments.
author: Pliny The Elder

quote: If a man knows not to which port he sails, no wind is favorable.
author: Seneca

quote: Life will not postpone our death. So, let us not postpone our life
author: Unknown

quote: Win through your actions, never through argument.
author: Robert Greene

quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Learn from the mistakes of others... you can’t live long enough to make them all yourselves.
author: Chanakya

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: He will never have true friends who is afraid of making enemies.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: A man who is a master of patience is master of everything else.
author: George Savile

quote: Inaction breeds doubt and fear. Action breeds confidence and courage.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it’s not the same river and he’s not the same man.
author: Heraclitus

quote: Don’t let yourself be controlled by three things: people, money, or past experience.
author: Unknown

quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
author: Roy T. Bennett

quote: The goal is not to be better than the other man, but your previous self.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The future depends on what you do.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We have two ears and one mouth, so we should listen more than we say.
author: Zeno

quote: The bigger the ‘why’ the easier the ‘how’.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: The only man who never makes mistakes is the man who never does anything.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: We’re what we repeatedly do. Excellence, therefore, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: If you quit once it becomes a habit. Never quit!
author: Michael Jordan

quote: When a person dies, he leaves his belongings at home, his family at the graveside and the only thing that accompanies him are his deeds.
author: Unknown

quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn’t do than by the ones you did do.
author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.

quote: One moment can change a day, one day can change a life and one life can change the world.
author: Buddha
